values: Absolutely amazing night!  man, only in gillett
oh, this is what my mom found in the pasture today. Is he not darling?

i am so hungry and bored at the moment... So I'll record some cheery (or just random) stuff into my journal. HURRAH!!! Stream of consciousness from Lauren, what could be better? Anyway, as I said, I'm hungry, and I really want to eat but it's still only 5:16. I have to wait a half an hour. Then steak!! Hopefully good cause it may be bad. If bad, i will come back and eat like a crazy vegan- 2nd supper or somethin like that, just like i had brunch in two places this morning- FUN! so, YEAH! I think I am crazy cause my schedule is insane. I didn't plan on auditioning for choir, but somehow it just happened, so I'm in chorus, and then i didn't plan on audiitoning for chamber chorus, but deanna was just like you should audition for chamber chorus!! So i was like, ok, I have nothing better to do, but that makes my schedule chock full, esp since I haven't scheduled my equitation classes yet. I still want to be in chambers cause it would be fun- pretty music from all over the world, and I have so missed being in choir! I have already learned so much so hopefully both choirs will be an extremely enriching experience! And if I die from exhaustion, who cares for I shall die fulfilled!!! hahahaha!!!!! Anyway, I won't die, cause i'll just decide not to do some work if i need to and still do well in everything and be just dandy. But, i need to be more ambitious, and actually try, and study, and all that crap cause i need to get into vet school!! Cornell here i come, hopefully. I've already planned out my schedule so that i cna have all my requirements done and apply my soph year! SCORE!! Now I just need to execute this master plan and be one of the select few to be accepted, HURRAH!! But, that means work, but then I could just relax and go abroad and not worry about such things junior and senior year. That sounds like fun. I'm not an ambitious person, typically, I don't care about competition, cause who cares, but i really will try hard to get into cornell!! ANd it's fun to be ambitious about this!! So anyway, i'm no longer trying out for a cappella this year : ( But next year I'm all over it!!! YEAH!!!!!! OK, I've wasted exactly ten minutes with this nothingness. Let's see if I can waste some more time. Oh no!! I'm getting lightheaded at the lap top!! i shall put my head on the keyboard and see what letters come out! yh ONLY 2!!!!!! Oh well, y and h must mean something. Like tea leaves or soemthing.or, it could just be a shortened version of.... wait for it...


YEAH!!!
tATA!

Due to the obnoxious, privacy invading father of my friend, this journal is mostly friends only.  However, I don't really care who else reads my journal, so if you want to be my friend, just leave a comment and I'll add you! : )

I've been meaning to post this for a while, so here it goes. We rescued a horse on Thursday, from a home that was supposed to be rescuing her, fostering her until she found a home. The people who did this to Zanzi are absolutely disgusting. How can anyone completely neglect such a beautiful animal? Here's a pic of her before, when she just got off the truck from Canada. She came at the same time as my horse Fjona. She was a PMU rescue who wasn't bred. The stupid people bred this poor mangy, pestilence filled, emaciated mare!!!!!!!




She has more hair than now, but she was healthy!

Here are the after pictures:







One can only hope that these people get what's coming to them!

Damn the whole stupid world.  yeah, i use colorful language 







i'm so sad:( i don't even want to write 






ashley still can't breathe, which means goodbye :(

she's even off of hay now...nothing works

ok, i'm kind of happy now!!  GILLETT HOUSE!!!!!!!  AWESOME!!!!

and, I saw my grandparents and they just said

well girls, we talked it over, and we decided to pay for your tuition and board.
Claire had written them letters, I hadn't talked to them since the incident, and I didn't even have to ask.

Why did they make it so easy????

No worries now!!!!

Ummmmmm, I'm still bored, so here are some random pictures!!!



Is not Taisy the most gorgeous horse in the world? <33333333333333333333333



Kitten has the coolest eyes in this pic


Simba is sooo weird


Fjona is sooo pretty (i love the sky in this pic)


Her mane is awesome here


Check out Chuckie's tongue!


Ashy!!!


Checkers being perfectly normal :)


Tommie and me at the parade

So, I have a new chick!!! I went out to the coop this afternoon and heard cheeping =D. Rainbow has been sitting on eggs for about 26 days. Duck eggs take 35 days to hatch, so i was surorised. When I looked under her, I found a chick!!! One of those sneaky chickens laid an egg, even though we *thought* we had taken all of the chicken eggs out. OH well, so I am handraising ***her*** for she surely will be a hen!! Here are some pics!

Shortly after she was born!!  She's so gorgeous!

her "mom" Rainbow (after the malaysian entree, hehehe) except she's sitting on eggs for another week so I am now fozzie's mommy!
Last, Fozzie and Drakkar! (this pic is sooo big b/c drakkar is the most awesome cat in the world!!!!)

I <3 chicks!!!

oh, one more pic of L'range b/c she would be angry if I were to neglect her

Hurrah!  Today was the unofficial last day of high school!!!!!  Graduation on the 22nd!!! 
*me beaming*:)

As an afterthought...
I must add that the ever-present dread of the approaching ap calc exam is beginning to oppress my mind. What is one to do without the heart to study? I shall languish in despondency all weekend and then despair... no, that will not happen...

 My sister claims she's psychic.
Clairvoyant Claire
 proclaims I will get a 5
:/ If only she really were psychic...but perhaps she is? Clairvoyant or not, I should do well on Mr. Geary's determination alone!
To bed I go
and I <3 Smith!

Yo
so I'm going to New York tomorrow for Gaelic!!
Irish famine Museum
Ellis Island
Kilevan's Pub!

What could be better? :)


AND
It will be raining- JUST LIKE IRELAND!!!




I <3 SMITH!!
